data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hi,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ 0 d,
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c' hi,
rw add_zero (a + b),
rw add_zero b,
refl,

rw add_succ (a + b) c',
rw add_succ b c',
rw add_succ a (b + c'),
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero a,
refl,

rw add_succ (succ a) b',
rw hi,
rw add_succ a b',
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw zero_add a,
refl,

rw add_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw succ_add b' a,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ n 0,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc a c b,
rw add_comm c b,
rw add_assoc a b c,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with m' hi,
rw mul_zero 0,
refl,

rw mul_succ 0 m',
rw add_zero (0 * m'),
rw hi,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ m 0,
rw mul_zero m,
rw zero_add m,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
induction m with m' hi,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ (succ 0) m',
rw hi,
rw add_succ m' 0,
rw add_zero m',
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw mul_zero t,
rw add_zero (t * a),
refl,


rw add_succ a b',
rw mul_succ t (a + b'),
rw hi,
rw mul_succ t b',
rw add_assoc ( t * a ) (t * b') t,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c' hi,
rw mul_zero (a * b),
rw mul_zero b,
rw mul_zero a,
refl,

rw mul_succ ( a * b) c',
rw hi,
rw mul_succ b c',
rw mul_add a (b * c') b,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw mul_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero (a * 0),
rw mul_zero a,
refl,


rw mul_succ (succ a) b',
rw mul_succ a b',
rw add_assoc (a * b') a (succ b'),
rw add_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw add_comm a b',
rw add_assoc (a * b') b' (succ a),
rw add_succ b' a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw add_zero a,
rw zero_mul t,
rw add_zero (a * t),
refl,

rw add_succ a b',
rw succ_mul b' t,
rw succ_mul (a + b') t,
rw hi,
rw add_assoc (a * t) (b' * t) t,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b' hi,
rw mul_zero a,
rw zero_mul a,
refl,

rw mul_succ a b',
rw hi,
rw succ_mul b' a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw mul_comm a (b * c),
rw mul_comm a c,
rw mul_assoc b c a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ 0 m,
rw mul_zero (0 ^ m ),
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ a 0,
rw pow_zero a,
rw one_mul a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with m' hi,
rw pow_zero 1,
refl,

rw pow_succ 1 m',
rw hi,
rw mul_one 1,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw add_zero m,
rw pow_zero a,
rw mul_one (a ^ m),
refl,

rw add_succ m n',
rw pow_succ a (m + n'),
rw pow_succ a n',
rw hi,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ m) (a ^ n') a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw pow_zero (a*b),
rw pow_zero b,
rw pow_zero a,
rw mul_one 1,
refl,

rw pow_succ (a * b),
rw pow_succ a n',
rw mul_assoc (a ^ n') a (b ^ succ n'),
rw mul_comm a (b ^ succ n'),
rw pow_succ b n',
rw mul_assoc (b ^ n') b a,
rw mul_comm b a,
rw hi,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ n') (b ^ n') (a * b),
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n' hi,
rw pow_zero (a ^ m),
rw mul_zero m,
rw pow_zero a,
refl,

rw pow_succ (a ^ m) n',
rw mul_succ m n',
rw hi,
rw pow_add a (m * n') m ,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw pow_zero ( a + b),
rw pow_zero a,
rw pow_zero b,
rw one_mul (a + b),
rw one_mul a,
rw one_mul b,
rw succ_mul (succ 0) a,
rw succ_mul 0 a,
rw zero_mul a,
rw zero_add a,
rw add_mul a b (a + b),
rw mul_add a a b,
rw mul_add b a b,
rw add_mul a a b,
rw mul_comm a b,
rw add_assoc (a * a) (b * a) (b * a + b * b),
rw add_assoc (a * a) (b * b) (b * a + b * a),
rw add_comm (b * b) (b * a + b * a),
rw add_assoc (b * a) (b * a) (b *b),
refl,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
example : mynat → mynat :=

example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=

example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=

example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=

example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=

theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
